## Question 1

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(vroom)
library(here)
```

```{r}
here::i_am("grades-lab.Rproj")
grades <- vroom(here("grades.csv"))
```

## Question 2

```{r}
grades %>%
  select(grade) %>%
  summarise(n=n())
```
The data set contains 44771 grades.

## Question 3
```{r}
grades %>%
  distinct(id, .keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  summarise(n=n())
```
The data set contains 887 students.
